content: In what ways can the ambiance of a chilly December morning with a gentle snowfall be depicted on an [HTML page] through visual representation? Apart from a grey sky and light snowfall, what other design elements such as colors, fonts, and images can be utilized to express the mood and tone of the scenario? How can the light snowfall be effectively integrated into the design through appropriate design techniques and components? Please present a design example using Latex code that encapsulates the essence of the atmosphere.
